thread.title: The "Twilight" Cast In The First Movie, Last Movie, And Now
thread.title_full: The "Twilight" Cast In The First Movie, Last Movie, And Now

author: Pablo Valdivia, Lara Parker
title: The "Twilight" Cast In The First Movie, Last Movie, And Now
text:
Fun fact: Kristen doesn’t watch TV.
ID: 10607405 2. Robert Pattinson (Edward Cullen) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
Chris Jackson / Getty Image
 Fun fact: Rob said he was going to quit acting all together the day before his Twilight audition because he wasn’t getting any jobs.
ID: 10607441 3. Taylor Lautner (Jacob Black) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
Charley Gallay / Getty Images
 Fun fact: Taylor HATED his wig from the first film. In fact, he suggested burning it when he wrapped.
ID: 10607670 4. Anna Kendrick (Jessica Stanley) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images
 Fun fact: Anna got so sick during her Twilight audition that she had to go home early, even though the casting people wanted her to stay.
ID: 10607845 5. Billy Burke (Charlie Swan) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
Frederick M. Brown / Getty Images
 Fun fact: The first time Billy and Kristen met was on a plane to Portland and Billy went up to Kristen and said, “I’m your dad!”
ID: 10607919 6. Ashley Greene (Alice Cullen) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images
 Fun fact: Ashley had a crush on Jackson Rathbone (Jasper) when they first started filming.
ID: 10607471 7. Nikki Reed (Rosalie Cullen) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
John Sciulli / Getty Images
 Fun fact: She is married to Ian Somerhalder, who plays a vampire on The Vampire Diaries . Vampires in love.
ID: 10607453 8. Peter Facinelli (Carlisle Cullen) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images
 Fun fact: Peter said he is totally down to do another Twilight movie if author Stephanie Meyer writes another book.
ID: 10608834 9. Kellan Lutz (Emmet Cullen) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
ANGELA WEISS / Getty Images
 Fun fact: Kellan used to be an Abercrombie model.
ID: 10607462 10. Jackson Rathbone (Jasper Cullen) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
jacksonrathbone / instagram.com
 Fun fact: Jackson was once a reporter for Disney 411 , where he interviewed stars like Hilary Duff and Christy Carlson Romano.
ID: 10607633 11. Christian Serratos (Angela Weber) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
John Sciulli / Getty Images
 Fun fact: Before Twilight , Christian played Ned’s crush, Suzie Crabgrass, in Ned’s Declassified School Survival Guide .
ID: 10607954 12. Michael Welch (Michel Newton) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
Rachel Murray / Getty Images
 Fun fact: Fans sent Michael hundreds of socks after he jokingly said he was running low during a road trip.
ID: 10608192 13. Justin Chon (Eric Yorkie) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images
 Fun fact: Justin co-owns a chain of stores in Southern California named Attic.
ID: 10608294 14. Elizabeth Reaser (Esme Cullen) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
FREDERIC J. BROWN / Getty Images
 Fun fact: Elizabeth has said she is “nothing like [her] character” and thinks Bryce Dallas Howard should have played Esme instead.
ID: 10607657 15. Robot baby and Mackenzie Foy (Renesmee Cullen) Summit Entertainment
Summit Entertainment
Matt Winkelmeyer / Getty Images
 Fun fact: Mackenzie is a black belt in Tae Kwon Do.
Note: Renesmee first makes her appearance in Breaking Dawn: Part 1 .
ID: 10608342
